collectible.title: Yuno's Friendship Photo
collectible.subtitle: Uno, Dos, Tres, Cuatro
collectible.text: A picture of Yuno and his closest friends - Ayumi, Gaku, and Yanagi - having the time of their lives during the obligatory beach episode. They've been through many things together, and although the game of Uno has its highs and lows, their friendship developed and endured through all their struggles. (Open the picture in a new window to see it full size.)
collectible.unlock: Finish a single game with Yuno Katsugo and three other opponents who have blue, green, and purple hair.

collectible.title: Yuno's Deck Style
collectible.subtitle: A game of colors and numbers!
collectible.text: A deck of poker cards that use colors instead of suits. Unlocks the "Last Card" deck style, accessible through the Card Decks menu in the Collectibles screen.
collectible.unlock: Finish a game against Yuno Katsugo.

collectible.title: Yuno's Lucky Seven
collectible.subtitle: The best head you could ask for
collectible.text: When a redhead succubus asks you if you wanna get your dick sucked, you should probably give it a go. Looks like Yuno left this card behind after the fact.
collectible.unlock: To see a special dual forfeit interaction, play against Yuno and Mari Setogaya - putting them next to each other - and get lucky enough to see her offer to give him... the big succ.
